meanings.definition: A store selling cold cuts, cheeses, and a variety of salads, as well as a selection of unusual or foreign prepared foods.
meanings.sent1: I went to the delis to buy some cheese and salad for a picnic.
meanings.sent2: The delis in the neighborhood offer a wide range of cold cuts and prepared foods.
meanings.sent3: At the delis, I found a salad so big, it could feed a whole family!
meanings.sent4: The delis was a treasure trove of exotic foods, like a culinary adventure.
meanings.sent5: The delis was bustling with customers eager to try the unique prepared foods.

meanings.sent1: We decided to have lunch at the delis down the street.
meanings.sent2: The delis on the corner is known for its delicious sandwiches.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally bumped into the delis sign while trying to read the menu.
meanings.sent4: The delis felt like a cozy haven in the midst of the busy city.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of fresh bread wafted from the delis, enticing passersby to come in.
